description: Mineral based sunscreen for those who like to stay as close to ‘au naturel’ as possible. Sun Bum’s Mineral sunscreen uses zinc as its primary active ingredient to protects your skin from harmful UVA and UVB.Stick format is easy to apply sandy hands and to wriggly tiny humans.Broad-spectrum UVA and UVB protection.Non-greasy formula.Moisturizing zinc based formula (non-nano).Water resistant rating of 80 minutes.Gluten, paraben, oxybenzone and octinoxate free.Ingredients: zinc oxide 19.2%, coconut oil, avocado oil, meadowfoam seed oil, linseed seed oil, rice bran wax, candelilla wax, butyloctyl salicylate, carnauba wax, ozokerite, shea butter, oryzanol, fragrance, cocoa seed butter, safflower seed oil, jojoba esters, tocopherol, bisabolol.
name: Sun Bum Mineral SPF 50 Face Stick 13g
